content:
Hi,
I just wanted to ask if there already are plans for a PAMonFHIR profile in IHE?
So far I didn't find any hints on https://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Profiles
Thanks

There is a supplement under development for the Patient side of PAM. But it is not the Encounter Maagement that is part of PAM; thus it is not covering the same space as PAM. Details can be found https://github.com/IHE/IT-Infrastructure/tree/master/PRIM
Thank you @John Moehrke , I will take a look at it.
